title: I think I deserve an S.

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body: My score speaks for itself. I understand that only an individual's performance is accounted for when graded, but I don't think thats how the system should operate.

replies.body:
Grading is based on your performance being compared to other players with the same champion and role. If you're finding yourself getting a lower grade, it means that other players with that same champion did a little bit better with their stats.

You're still on your way to getting that S. Just keep doing your best, you got this! :)
You died 4 times in less than 30 minuites. No you don't. Also your team was trash and ruined the game. xD

11 deaths in 27:23, S-, loss, just under 3:1 kdr
5 deaths in 21:25, S, win, just over 4:1 kdr
3 deaths in 20:55, S, win, just over 10:1 kdr
6 deaths in 18:16, S-, win, just over 5:1 kdr
Number of deaths isn't everything. Also, all 4 were different champions, and being compared differently.

Even if you did better than other people in that specific match, you still didn't excel over the majority of other players in that same position. If you were able to turn this game around into a win, I think that may have been a step towards that peak.
